attributes.action: Ensure the future of the Ross Tiger.
attributes.additional_details: An article in the Grimsby Telegraph identified the struggle the Ross Tiger has endured, in regards to it's upkeep and many have been frustrated not to see the neccisary work carried out. The Ross tiger is the only reminder in grimsby of the fishing heritage of the area and this must be preserved out of respect of the fishermen, the past generation and that of future generations.
attributes.background: The Ross Tiger is an important part of history and a valued heritage of Grimsby Town. The ship future has been allowed to be called into question and with each day that passes the ship becomes more and more at risk of loss. We feel it is in the nations interest to ensure the future of the Ross Tiger

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
